content: treat yourself or someone you love to the **merry spa set** a delightful 2-in-1 crochet pattern featuring a washcloth and soap saver this quick and satisfying project is perfect for holiday gift-giving stocking stuffers or creating a cozy self-care set all year round designed with simplicity in mind the merry spa set crochet pattern works beautifully with any soft cotton yarn and is a great way to use up leftover yarn from your stash whether you re a beginner or an experienced crocheter you ll enjoy how fun and relaxing it is to make **pattern attributes** - the pattern is simple detailed and thoroughly tested - written in us terms - skill level easy to intermediate - size washcloth 9 x9 soap saver h= 5 x w= 4 - yarn type # 4 worsted weight cotton yarn - crochet hook h 5 mm - the pattern includes step-by-step detailed written instructions
